content.p: We’re proud of all our students and we’d love to stay in touch with everyone after they graduate. Want to stay up to date on all the latest happenings at the School of Medicine? Whenever we’ve got news to share, we’re always happy to share it on social media. So, if you want a glimpse into what we’re getting up to after you’ve left, make sure to follow us! As an alumni of the School of Medicine and the University of Nottingham, you can help current and future students. This could be with events, work placements, internships, career mentoring and more. Got some great stories about what you’ve been getting up to? Keep in touch and let us know. We’re always interested to hear from our alumni, and we’d love to celebrate your successes with you and the world. Contact the University Alumni Team Contact the School Contacts: Call 0115 823 0031 ext.30031 or please see our 'contact us' page for further details
